title: 【1.9+】【测试试行版OOC】原版血量显示+自定义血量（逼死模组系列）
author: CL_coin
txt_content:
咳咳，新人发帖，这几天我无聊，随手做了个ooc
规模很小，原版的血量显示，这是测试版的，仅支持僵尸
加载ooc后，僵尸会在被打击后显示血量，当然这个血量不是正常的血量，而是自定义的
这里我自定义的数值为5次，也就是被打击五次后，僵尸就会死亡，无论用什么（秒杀就算了）
如果你们觉得这个模组很有前途的话，跟我说，我去做个完整版的，包括武器判定啥的
比较适用于RPG地图
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~2 {Time:1,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Passengers:[{id:"FallingSand",Time:1,Block:"minecraft:activator_rail",Passengers:[{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"time set 18000"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"scoreboard objectives add MHP dummy"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~2 ~0 repeating_command_block 5 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/scoreboard players add @e[type=Zombie] MHP 1 {HurtTime:10s}"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~2 ~0 chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/entitydata @e[score_MHP_min=1,score_MHP=1,type=Zombie] {CustomName:\\"Zombie ?????\\"}"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~2 ~0 chain_command_block 3 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/entitydata @e[score_MHP_min=2,score_MHP=2,type=Zombie] {CustomName:\\"Zombie ?????\\"}"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/entitydata @e[score_MHP_min=3,score_MHP=3,type=Zombie] {CustomName:\\"Zombie ?????\\"}"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/entitydata @e[score_MHP_min=4,score_MHP=4,type=Zombie] {CustomName:\\"Zombie ?????\\"}"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 3 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/entitydata @e[score_MHP_min=5,score_MHP=5,type=Zombie] {CustomName:\\"Zombie ?????\\"}"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~2 ~2 chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/entitydata @e[score_MHP_min=5,score_MHP=5,type=Zombie] {Health:0}"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"fill ~-1 ~1 ~-1 ~3 ~3 ~3 glass 14 outline"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"fill ~-1 ~1 ~-1 ~3 ~1 ~3 stained_hardened_clay 7"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"fill ~-1 ~3 ~-1 ~3 ~3 ~3 stained_hardened_clay 7"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:lava 15"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~ air 0"}]}]}复制代码
生成器使用懒癌卫士（pcb）
